<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> shall be <S%H3205>born<s%> to you, <S%H1931>who<s%> shall be a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4496>rest;<s%> and I will give him <S%H5117>rest<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about: for his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H8253>quietness<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in his <S%H3117>days.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be with you; and <S%H6743>prosper<s%> you, and <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> as he has <S%H1696>said<s%> of you.
